Goop
Definitely situational. I suppose she could be a decent swap in if you are facing a bunch of mystics. You would have to swap in at least one other fig to get it to work and then you are taking up a fair amount of your sideline for something you may not even need. I'd probably just use it when i know the store is running some halloween/monster/mystical theme and i expect the "Circle of Four" will do well.
